article_title: John Kasich Is the Real Deal

article_metadata.author: John Zogby

og.description: Seemingly lost in the all the “Donaldfoolery” of late is that a real candidate announced his bid for the Republican nomination for President: Governor John Kasich of Ohio. Kasich brings a singular level of experience to the race as both a legislator and an executive, significant business success, four decades of [...]
